headline: Why CSX (CSX) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of freight rail services provider CSX (NASDAQ:CSX) jumped 4% in the pre-market session after the company's stock rose amid reports of potential merger and acquisition activity heating up within the U.S. freight rail industry.

raw.headline: Why CSX (CSX) Stock Is Up Today
raw.summary: Shares of freight rail services provider CSX (NASDAQ:CSX) jumped 4% in the pre-market session after the company's stock rose amid reports of potential merger and acquisition activity heating up within the U.S. freight rail industry.

headline: Railroad stocks, Microsoft, Equifax: Trending Tickers
summary: Railroad stocks, like Union Pacific (UNP), Norfolk Southern (NSC), and CSX Corp (CSX), are climbing on reports of railway mergers. Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-B, BRK-A) CEO Warren Buffett has denied reports from Semafor and Reuters that BNSF Railway is in talks with Goldman Sachs to acquire a regional rival. Microsoft (MSFT) said Chinese state-sponsored hackers exploited a SharePoint flaw to breach global systems, though the company has since issued a patch. Equifax (EFX) stock is slipping after the company issued weaker-than-expected third quarter and full-year guidance. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts here.

headline: Berkshire Hathaway May Have Stepped Up Its Role in Potential Railroad Mergers
summary: The rail unit of Warren Buffett’s firm reportedly hired Goldman as a financial advisor after Union Pacific considers a deal for Norfolk Southern.

headline: Berkshire Hathaway Just Joined Railroad Merger Party, May Have Eyes For CSX
summary: Berkshire Hathaway's BNSF Railway has reportedly hired Goldman Sachs in an apparent reaction to news that Union Pacific is in talks to acquire Norfolk Southern to form a transcontinental railroad. Analysts have speculated that BNSF might make a bid for CSX to form its own line.
